primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
Time Frame:
Fiat withdrawals sent by EFT are processed twice a day (business days), with cut-off times at 8:00 AM EST and 4:00 PM EST.

Typically, once processed â€“ you should receive your funds within one business day, depending on your financial institution's hours of operation.

If you created a withdrawal that has been confirmed and processed out of your account but has yet to land in your bank account after one business day, you might have entered incorrect bank account information.

Withdrawals with incorrect bank account information will be returned to your Ndax account within 3-5 business days. (Business days: Monday to Friday, business days may vary based on Provincial and National holidays.)

Fees: $4.99

Limit: There are no limits on EFT withdrawals.
